meanings.def: connected with one of the large areas that some countries are divided into, with its own local government
connected with the parts of a country that do not include the capital city, especially when these are regarded as lacking culture or modern ideas
examples: It was all very dull and provincial—I longed for the city.

meanings.def: unwilling to consider new or different ideas or things
examples: In spite of his education and travels, he has remained very provincial.

meanings.def: a person who lives in or comes from a part of the country that is not near the capital city, especially when regarded as lacking culture or modern ideas
